mcq.statement: Which statement best describes difference between Prokaryotic cell and Eukaryotic cell?   | Prokaryotic Cell  | Eukaryotic Cell

options.a: Membrane bound organelle is present | Membrane bound organelle is absent
options.b: Ribosomal subunits are 50s & 30s| Ribosomal subunits are 60s & 40s
options.c: DNA is double stranded | DNA is circular
